main event: On August 18, 1958, four large objects were observed in the sky in Beacon, New York.
interesting points: The objects were described as red and blue-white and were four to seven times larger than Sputnik,The sighting lasted between 60 to 90 seconds,The objects were observed moving in a straight course to the west, The sighting was possibly an aircraft but visual confirmation was deemed impossible from the distance, The objects were out of sight behind trees at the end of the observation.
sighted object: four large red and blue-white objects
